pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw:
Aha, sorry I wasn't paying enough attention. show() can be called multiple times with no ill effect, so that's alright, then the only issue is if another plugin wants the GUI to not be shown yet.

Does it work if you do:
```
show()
setStyleSheet()
hide()
```
?

I would prefer if it wasn't one specific plugin responsible for when show() was called, if plugins can leave things the way they found them other than the things they are explicitly changing, then that would be ideal, if possible!
